did.abstract: One of the key managers for the Barnum and Bailey Circus, the papers of James McCaddon feature personal material from McCaddon's life. They primarily include his memoir, and a number of personal scrapbooks that document family trips and the birth of his son, James McCaddon Junior.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: James T. McCaddon was born in Beverly, Ohio on January 31, 1859. Starting as a manager of Adam Forepaugh;s circus, McCaddon went on to become the business manager of the Barnum and Bailey Circus. McCaddon was also the brother-in-law of James A. Bailey by way of James' sister, Ruth, and thus deeply connected to the business by family as well as interest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Contains personal life material of James McCaddon. Of note is his memoir, undated, and a number of scrapbooks that contain photographs of family trips and correspondence.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Manuscripts were given priority, with the bulk of the collection focusing on the memoir written in McCaddon's hand. Scrapbooks were separated out from other material, and divided between McCaddon's professional life and personal life.
